item.title: To CRI or not to CRI: A Tale of a Lonely Sandbox
item.description: Recently I have been trying to wrap my head around what has been happening in the kubernetes runtime space, doing so made me realize that alot has happened and I was too busy to catch up, as a result, I decided to write this blog post which summarizes my thoughts after reading up a bit. Have a look at this post’s outline and feel free to jump to sections of choice if you already feel confident about the topic.
